extraDescription: Technical Writers, Project Administrator, and Project Manager required to support Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) in the completion of the design and implementation phase of its long-term accommodation plan.
comments: This contract was competitively sourced.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.This contract includes one or more amendments.This contract is a multi-year contract.This contract was originally omitted and was added to this quarters report during 2016-17 Q4.
